A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointed with TLJ! As a huge Star Wars fan this was my most anticipated movie of the year and it did not live up to the hype. I'll put it like this\, one of my favorite directors is Quentin Tarantino but I wouldn't want him to direct a Star Wars movie because it would be his style and not Star Wars\, that's what happened with this movie. It definitely did not feel like a Star Wars movie\, ruined the greatest hero in a galaxy far\, far away\, and I can only hope JJ will be able to salvage episode IX.
